title: Enchanting Neelam Polki Haar: A Timeless Treasure
features: This exquisite necklace features a delicate arrangement of polki diamonds, each meticulously set in a closed setting to maximize their brilliance. The necklace culminates in a striking pear-shaped Neelam pendant, surrounded by a halo of sparkling polki diamonds. The design blends traditional polki craftsmanship with a modern, minimalist aesthetic. The gold exhibits a refined 'Hyderabadi Polish,' lending a subtle luster and enhancing the antique feel.

description: This Polki Haar is a fusion of tradition and contemporary elegance. The uncut diamonds retain their natural beauty, offering a raw, organic feel that is both luxurious and understated. The rare Neelam (Blue Sapphire) enhances the piece's regal charm. Handcrafted by skilled artisans in Hyderabad, this necklace is a testament to exceptional craftsmanship and enduring style.
